api_key.Description: The API Key that allows interaction with the API

rate_limit.Description: Allows users to set the speed of API calls to work with the Vultr Rate Limit

retry_limit.Description: Allows users to set the maximum number of retries allowed for a failed API call.

enable_private_network.Deprecated: In the next release of this provider we will be removing `enable_private_network` due to issues that may cause drift and having to maintain private network ip state. Please switch to using private_network_ids to manage your private network fields.
